biotools.summary: Large-scale subtomogram classification, template matching, subtomogram averaging, and alignment. Also provides a pre-configured TomoMinerCloud computing service permitting users without sufficient computing resources instant access to TomoMiners high-performance features.

bioschemas.name: TomoMiner
